reference.description: bz#1810387: CVE-2020-1762 kiali: ignoring JWT claim fields

remediation.description:
The OpenShift Service Mesh release notes provide information on the features and known issues:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.3/service_mesh/servicemesh-release-notes.html

notes.note: npmjs-url-parse: Improper validation of protocol of the returned URL

reference.description: bz#1800774: CVE-2020-8124 npmjs-url-parse: Improper validation of protocol of the returned URL

remediation.description:
The OpenShift Service Mesh release notes provide information on the features and known issues:
https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.3/service_mesh/servicemesh-release-notes.html

note:
An update for Jaeger and Kiali is now available for Openshift Service Mesh 1.0.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh is Red Hat's distribution of the Istio service mesh project, tailored for installation into an on-premise OpenShift Container Platform installation.
Security Fix(es):
* npmjs-url-parse: Improper validation of protocol of the returned URL (CVE-2020-8124)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
